name: Sleep Mode
description:
In this game, your character has fallen into Sleep Mode and aimlessly drifts forward. You need to use your enemies to guide your character to the end goal.

Controls

Move - A and D, or left and right arrow keys

Jump - W, or up arrow key

Restart - R

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. All art, SFX, music and code was made in the jam window by me, Curruff.
